titleStmt.title: The history of magick by way of apology, for all the wise men who have unjustly been reputed magicians, from the Creation, to the present age. / Written in French, by G. Naudæus late library-keeper to Cardinal Mazarin. Englished by J. Davies.
Apologie pour tous les grands personnages qui ont esté faussement soupçonnez de magie. English
titleStmt.author: Naudé, Gabriel, 1600-1653.
